attributes.action: Strip Sir Norman Bettison of his title and position in the police force
attributes.additional_details:
Strip Sir Norman Bettison of his title and position in the police force, as he still maintains that the 96 who died at Hillsborough
footbal stadium were to blaim, despite the evidence to the contrary that it was the police and other authorities who were inefective and covered up their gross negligence for 23 years.
